summary: Adds a new home near the Snow-Shod Farm
descriptionHtml:
Adds a new home near the Snow-Shod Farm in Rift. Little home but with everything. Please comment if you like or dislike.

Forge
Armor Workbench
Grindstone
Ore Smelter
Enchanting Table
Alchemy Table
Tanning Rack
Storages
Chopping Block and Wood Storage
Talos and Akatosh Shrines 


Credits and Thanks:

[/url]INSTALLATION:

Install with NMM(Recomended)

Required

Latest version of skyrim
Dawnguard, Dragonborn, Hearthfire

My other mod

author: Sevane
